document.title: Setting the editor behavior
document.paragraph:
Some of
../../reference/20_editor/00_introduction.xml the editor properties are customizable.
../../reference/20_editor/60_autocomplete/00_introduction.xml Automatic completion , for instance, can be partially or totally disabled, and inserted strings can be defined by the user. Some accelerators are customizable too. For more information, please refer to the
../../reference/85_preferences/eiffelstudio/40_editor/index.xml editor preferences reference .
See Also
20_changing_texts_display.xml Text colors and font customization.
